snippet: Representative Edward J. Markey took the Democratic primary, and the Republican nomination went to Gabriel E. Gomez, a private equity investor.
abstract: Rep Edward J Markey easily defeats fellow congressman Stephen F Lynch in Massachusetts's Democratic primary, clearing first hurdle in his drive to become United States senator; Republican nomination goes to Gabriel E Gomez, who will face Markey in special general election to fill Senate seat left vacant by Secretary of State John Kerry.

byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood contributed reporting from Cohasset, Mass.

lead_paragraph: Representative Edward J. Markey took the Democratic primary, and the Republican nomination went to Gabriel E. Gomez, a private equity investor.

headline.seo: Massachusetts Senate Primaries Won by Edward Markey and Gabriel Gomez
headline.main: Senior Congressman and Newcomer Win Senate Nods in Massachusetts
headline.print_headline: Senior Congressman and Newcomer Win Senate Nods in Massachusetts
